outputs.output_descr: The Regional Small Arms and Light Weapons (SALW) Training Programme at the Kofi Annan International Peacekeeping Training Center (KAIPTC) will complement the capacity building efforts of the ECOWAS Small Arms Control Programme (ECOSAP) through targeted training for personnel of the various National Commissions for Small Arms in the 15 ECOWAS Member States and their partners. The proposed programme builds on the achievements of the ongoing SALW training programme at the KAIPTC which is supported by the Government of Japan on behalf of the ECOWAS Commission.

project_descr: Regional  Small arms and Light Weapons Project aimed at developing the capacity of Ecowas countries to be able to implement the ECOWAS convention on small arms and light weapons control
project_title: Regional  Small arms and Light Weapons Project
